<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/answers/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Returns an array of docs with their access and tags.
## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"access","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"staff"},"description":"The access group the user performing the request is in. Default is 'public'."}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details>
